Created an attachment (id=3247)
PlantyContentOutlinePage.java that fixes the bug.

I did make a comment in the source, that tries to explain the problem.

Alf, it looks like your fix only addresses the case where a tag is split over
two lines. Can the fix be generated to handle a tag split over an arbitrary
number of lines?

Jared, 
I tested also the case that the string is split over many lines.
The fix also fixes this case.
For some reason the offset is always wrong by one.
